item.title: CVE-2024-23502|2024-01-31T15:26:34.022Z -- infornweb -- posts%20list%20designer%20by%20category%20%E2%80%93%20list%20category%20posts%20or%20recent%20posts
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in InfornWeb Posts List Designer by Category – List Category Posts Or Recent Posts allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Posts List Designer by Category – List Category Posts Or Recent Posts: from n/a through 3.3.2.
